milestone_description: TMF pathway meeting conducted with ADEM staff; meeting minutes sent
Listening Session #1 held with >=50 attendees (opt-in list captured)
Secure >=$10M in funding commitments for near-term spill-prevention up
TMF Requirement Path delivered by ADEM
>$10m in funding actually awarded to the utility
Funded projects equal to identified critical projects and are in construction
Water-quality impact report completed and published
Outfall bacteria compliance window closes with all samples in-limit
Achieve >=0.5M gallon annual reduction in sewage spills (baseline -> 2027)
